results.title: Romi Stock In Focus: Can Indústrias Romi S.A. Turn A Quiet Tape Into A Breakout?
results.snippet: Brazilian machinery maker Indústrias Romi S.A. has been trading in a tight range, with muted volume and little fresh news.

results.title: WEB EXCLUSIVE: Brazilian injection machine maker buying Sandretto
results.snippet: Industrias Romi, Brazil's largest maker of injection molding machines, and the country's largest maker of machine tools, has a contract to acquire the ass.
